ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 39
ygData.msgSnippet: I have read lots of posts about kill stealing, people not standing in line on camp sites, blablabla, Personaly I always play a nice guy. I try to get along
ygData.messageBody:
I have read lots of posts about kill stealing, people not standing in line
on camp sites, blablabla,

Personaly I always play a nice guy. I try to get along with most people and
U usually do it pretty well.
If people are idiots I just dont bother with em.
I usually dont camp for items cus its often faster getting the muny to buy
it of the player that camped it and you get xp doing it.

But this is a differet thing, I think.
How did this guy start off?
Did he do it in character or ooc?
Since the guy is a darkelf he should/could steal as much as he wanted too,
since darkelves don show any respect for anyone.
BUT, if you are a troll and/or he was talkin ooc stuff to you,
its a whole different thing.

to sum it up, evil chars can do pretty much whatever they want as log as
they do it in character, ooc badmouthing is stupid and I dont think that
players that do that should play eq, thats what quake is for.

IMHO, and thats important

Vashi, Eternal warriors

>From: Morix@...

>Commonlands, et al. One day in the desert this nasty little dark elf
>shadowknight has hanging around and this guy is a known kill-stealer and a
>real jerk (anyone who frequents the desert *might* know who I'm t/*alking
>about). He was hanging around our party making rude gestures at us
